messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Reminder - Curriculum is coming
messages.msgSnippet: Well, this was mysterious for a bit ;-) Someone had added an event to the calendar -- probably assuming it was a private calendar -- and it was automatically
messages.messageBody:
Well, this was mysterious for a bit ;-)

Someone had added an event to the calendar -- probably assuming it was a
private calendar -- and it was automatically sending out reminders.

Joyce
Unschooling-dotcom moderator

messages.subject: Reminder - Curriculum is coming
messages.msgSnippet: We would like to remind you of this upcoming event. Curriculum is coming Date: Thursday, January 23, 2003 Time: 10:00AM - 3:00PM EST (GMT-05:00)
messages.messageBody:
